headline.main: INVADER IS STALLED; Nazis Said to Have Lost 30,000 in One Salient of Moscow Front

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Sunday, Nov. 16 -- Russian forces on the Leningrad front continued throughout yesterday their unrelenting pressure against German positions along a line stretching from a point just south of the city to Tikhvin, about 125 miles away on the Leningrad-Vologda road.
abstract: USSR forces continue pressure from Leningrad; Germans reptd stalled, Moscow front; great losses rept; USSR Army has initiative; Germans admit violent USSR attacks in center sector and Crimea
